messages.title: LOCAL PEOPLE'S CHOICE AT THIS ELECTION - A LOCAL CHAMPION OR LABOUR FAILURES
messages.content: The Labour Government has failed local people - John Leech will deliver real change for us.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrat will give you the power to sack corrupt MPs and stop MPs being bought by millionaire and billionaire donors.

mentions.tacticalSituation: YOUR VOTE could decide who wins in Manchester

issues.education: Fighting for services at Christie, Fought to save Burnage Walk-in-centre pressed FESC to fulfill their promise of a new Kingsway Medical Centre
issues.governance: Promised to continue fighting for an honest, decent politics.
issues.health: Fought to save Burnage Walk-in-centre pressed FESC to fulfill their promise of a new Kingsway Medical Centre

leaflet.personalStatement: Fighting for you: Always fighting for services at Christie, Fought to save Burnage Walk-in-centre pressed FESC to fulfill their promise of a new Kingsway Medical Centre Pressed TESCO to honour their promise of a new medical centre

politicalExperience.achievements: Fighting for and winning changes to protect local people, Promised to continue fighting for an honest, decent politics, The only Manchester MP to vote against the Labour Government's Post Office closure plans.
